title: Russ Breault on PITN YouTube Video
post: Russ, I’ll tell you again: On the contrary to what you always say publicly (and again, you said it at the very beginning of this interview), the Shroud is not, in the strict sense of the term, an historical document of the Resurrection but rather a historical document of the Passion and death of Jesus of Nazareth…  The image and bloodstains on this cloth are showing a DEAD CHRIST and not a Risen one.
author: Yannick Clément
